author: jan
msg: Allow Futon to run behind a HTTP proxy.
Depending no the Proxy's RFC 2616 compliance,
some tests might fail (looking at you, nginx).
Patch by Jack Moffit and Damjan Georgievski.

author: wsmoak
msg: [CONTINUUM-2449] Add example project to test how Continuum handles scm urls when releasing vs. how the Maven command line does it.
